attributes.title: super buggy
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping to get some more news updates from the campaign, but instead I was just stuck dealing with a terrible app. It crashed frequently and I started getting a lot of automated text messages as well which was really irritating. Not worth it at ALL.
